languages.text: На алтаре возвышается картина, изображающая неизвестного вам святого и забранная в видавшую виды раму.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Какая-то святыня, вы не понимаете что это

languages.text: The large painting upon the altar depicts some saint whose visage you do not recognise. The frame has seen some wear and tear.
languages.original_text: На алтаре возвышается картина, изображающая неизвестного вам святого и забранная в видавшую виды раму.

traits.locale_text: The large painting upon the altar depicts some Saint whose visage you do not recognize. The frame has seen some wear and tear.
The large painting upon the altar depicts some Saint whose visage you do not recognize. The frame has seen some wear and tear.
The large painting upon the altar depicts some saint whose visage you do not recognise. The frame has seen some wear and tear.
The large painting upon the altar depicts some saint whose visage you do not recognise. The frame has seen some wear and tear.
The large painting upon the altar depicts some saint whose visage you do not recognise. The frame has seen some wear and tear.

languages.text: 祭坛上的巨画，上面画着某位你不认识的圣人，画框已经出现了磨损与撕裂的痕迹。
languages.original_text: The large painting upon the altar depicts some saint whose visage you do not recognise. The frame has seen some wear and tear.

traits.locale_text: 祭坛上的巨画，上面画着某位你不认识的圣人，画框已经出现了磨损与撕裂的痕迹。

languages.text: El gran cuadro sobre el altar representa a un santo cuya imagen no reconoces. El marco ha sufrido el paso del tiempo.
languages.original_text: The large painting upon the altar depicts some saint whose visage you do not recognise. The frame has seen some wear and tear.

traits.locale_text: El gran cuadro sobre el altar representa a un santo cuya imagen no reconoces. El marco ha sufrido el paso del tiempo.

languages.text: 祭壇に飾られている大きな絵画には、見覚えのない聖人の肖像が描かれている。額縁には多少の傷や劣化が見られる。
languages.original_text: The large painting upon the altar depicts some saint whose visage you do not recognise. The frame has seen some wear and tear.

traits.locale_text: 祭壇に飾られている大きな絵画には、見覚えのない聖人の肖像が描かれている。額縁には多少の傷や劣化が見られる。

languages.text: Das große Gemälde auf dem Altar zeigt irgendeinen Heiligen, dessen Gesicht du nicht erkennst. Der Rahmen ist schon ziemlich abgegriffen.
languages.original_text: The large painting upon the altar depicts some saint whose visage you do not recognise. The frame has seen some wear and tear.

traits.locale_text: Das große Gemälde auf dem Altar zeigt irgendeinen Heiligen, dessen Gesicht du nicht erkennst. Der Rahmen ist schon ziemlich abgegriffen.

languages.text: Le gigantesque tableau suspendu au-dessus de l'autel dépeint un saint que vous ne reconnaissez pas. Le cadre montre des traces d'usure.
languages.original_text: The large painting upon the altar depicts some saint whose visage you do not recognise. The frame has seen some wear and tear.

traits.locale_text: Le gigantesque tableau suspendu au-dessus de l'autel dépeint un saint que vous ne reconnaissez pas. Le cadre montre des traces d'usure.

languages.text: Sunağın üzerindeki büyükçe tabloda sana tanıdık gelmeyen bir aziz resmedilmiş. Çerçevesi bayağı aşınmış durumda.
languages.original_text: The large painting upon the altar depicts some saint whose visage you do not recognise. The frame has seen some wear and tear.

traits.locale_text: Sunağın üzerindeki büyükçe tabloda sana tanıdık gelmeyen bir aziz resmedilmiş. Çerçevesi bayağı aşınmış durumda.
